page.title: 12LIFE STYLES 2
page.content: A DAY IN MY LIFE.BY DEREK GRANTHAM(13) I usually wake up around 0600 and, after washing and dressing, I eat some cornflakes. I then brush my teeth and go outside to play football. I play until about 1000 and then I take my dog for a run. At 1100 I usually call for a friend, and we either go to the fair,the arcades or the beach.At the beach there is not much sand,but there are still things like crabs etc. Sometimes a stray dog follows us and we walk along the breakers and throw a stick out to sea, to watch him swim after it. At 1400 I return home, eat a quick snack and go fishing or play football. Then at 1700 I eat my dinner, normally a plate of chips,some vegetables and meat.After this, at about 1800, I play football AGAIN! At 1900 I watch telly and I go to bed at about 2200.
